name: places/ChIJBX1php72wokRUuzFwsEw5-A
adrFormatAddress: 4057 Broadway, New York, NY 10032-1516, USA

originalText.text:
I brought a jumpsuit here for a simple repair and a dry clean to be ready to wear for a wedding. I paid $25 dollars for the service and thought it all was ready. But come the day of the wedding, I found that the hole had not been fixed and the piece did not appear to have been properly cleaned. I don’t think anything was actually done. At this moment, I am trying to find a sewing kit so I can do the repair and have something to wear to a wedding in an hour.

There are many other cleaners and places that do alterations nearby. Very much regretting my decision to do business here!

originalText.text: I was charged $30 dollars to hem a $40 showery curtain. The staff was incredibly rude. I asked for a price list. They said they didn't have one so I could even check if I'd been hosed. Run away from here.

text.text: I was charged $30 dollars to hem a $40 showery curtain. The staff was incredibly rude. I asked for a price list. They said they didn't have one so I could even check if I'd been hosed. Run away from here.

originalText.text: Came here to get some shirts done, 3.50 a shirt which is pretty ballsy for up here, but they said they go over the shirt with satin remover, then dry clean and then wash. Interestingly enough the shirt came back with a stain. Baby was not having that. I also asked for no starch and when I asked since the shirt was stiff they said we always do a little.....Needless to say the stain came out but not worth the money or the effort.

originalText.text: Those people have no understanding of customer service. Not only did they ruin my husband's white coat, but the lady at the counter became so aggressive about it and started shouting at us. Very unprofessional and unpleasant. I do not recommend this place to anyone.

text.text: Those people have no understanding of customer service. Not only did they ruin my husband's white coat, but the lady at the counter became so aggressive about it and started shouting at us. Very unprofessional and unpleasant. I do not recommend this place to anyone.

originalText.text: Great service and very kind staff. I have used this place for two years now and I have always found great congenial service. My items are always perfect and on time. Prices are comparable to other places in the neighborhood. Give it a try!!!
